note.p: Daughter of William Mills Edye and his wife Maria, born in Fort Peddie, Grahamstown, Cape Colony, South Africa. Married James Philip Mansel Weale at Fort Peddie on 9 July 1868. Died in South Africa.
Jonathan Auld, The Aulds of Tizzana 3 May 2007, 〈http://www.tizzana.com.au/familyhistory/auld-p/index.htm〉, (accessed 30 May 2007)
South Africa, Church of the Province of South Africa, parish registers, 1801–2004 (familysearch.org, accessed 4 October 2022)
South Africa, civil marriage records, 1840–1973 (familysearch.org, accessed 4 October 2022)
South Africa, Cape Province, probate records of the Master of the High Court, 1834–1989 (familysearch.org, accessed 4 October 2022)
